name: lookup
javadoc:
/**
 * Escapes any XML special characters in the given key.
 *
 * @param key the key to unescape
 * @return the unescaped key
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Escapes any XML special characters in the given key, ensuring it can be safely used as an attribute or element name in an XML document.
 *
 * @param key the key to escape (e.g. a string containing '<', '>', '&', etc.)
 * @return the escaped key
 */
